title: Igor Fatin
text:
Igor Viktorovich Fatin (; born 24 November 1962) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er. 
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1979 for <a href="FC%20Zvezda%20Irkutsk">FC Zvezda Irkutsk</a>.
